titleStmt.title: A true and full relation of His Majesty's safe arrival and reception at the Hague Sent in a letter from a person of quality, to his friend in London.
titleStmt.author: J. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Walter Davis in Amen Corner,

notesStmt.note: At end: Tuesday, Feb. 6. 1690. New Stile.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
